name: Loss of Önd
description:
This game is a small game I have put together as a final major project in my college course of game development. It is based on Norse mythology and is top down.

CONTROLS:

Movement is WASD

Combat is space bar

Inventory click on the chest icon bottom left

FEEDBACK:

If you could also fill out the following form it would help me a lot -> https://forms.gle/kL2dQEPYa6h4T7dP
